query(Class<E>) - Method in class net.glxn.qbe.QueryByExample
Create a QBEQuery for the given JPA entity class.
QueryBuilder<T,E> - Class in net.glxn.qbe
 
QueryByExample - Class in net.glxn.qbe
QueryByExample enables querying an entity by passing in an example object, of any type.
QueryByExample(EntityManager) - Constructor for class net.glxn.qbe.QueryByExample
Construct a new QueryByExample using the supplied entityManager

The QueryByExample gives the ability to:
* get a list of entities matching the given criteria QBEExample.list()
new QueryByExample(entityManager).query(UserEntity.class).example(new User("foo")).list()

* get a single entity matching the given criteria QBEExample.item()
new QueryByExample(entityManager).query(UserEntity.class).example(new User("foo")).item()

*get the resulting typed query without executing it QBEExample.getQuery()
new QueryByExample(entityManager).query(UserEntity.class).example(new User("foo")).getQuery()

QBEExample.getQuery() can be useful if you need to do paging on the typed query.
